thread.title: Mahi Way! MS Dhoni travels in the train with his Jharkhand boys - Sports
thread.title_full: Mahi Way! MS Dhoni travels in the train with his Jharkhand boys - Sports

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Mahi Way! MS Dhoni travels in the train with his Jharkhand boys - Sports
text:
MS Dhoni 
Mahendra Singh Dhoni, who is the former skipper of Team India, may not be active on the international circuit as there are no ODIs currently. But that does not mean that Dhoni is totally off the cricket field.
MS Dhoni was recently appointed as skipper for the Jharkhand cricket team for the upcoming Vijay Hazare Trophy. Dhoni went on to share a picture along with his team-mates from Jharkhand on his Instagram account. But that is not the big surprise.
In MS Dhoni's Instagram picture, he is seen along with the boys travelling in a train.
  A post shared by @mahi7781 onFeb 21, 2017 at 6:08pm PST
Jharkhand will face Karnataka in their opening game for the Vijay Hazare Trophy in Kolkata.
Dhoni was recently dropped as captain of Indian Premier League franchise Rising Pune Supergiants ahead of the IPL auction 2017. Steve Smith was announced as his replacement for IPL 2017 season.
